Name: Bidi
Text: Do you know the person this statue represents? Her name is Marisa!

Name: Bidi
Text: Apparently that girl saved the entire world from a catastrophe years ago!

Name: Bidi
Text: She was also born in this city! People have a lot of respect for her.

Name: Bidi
Text: Unfortunately, she suddenly vanished one day and no one knows where she is now.

Name: Bidi
Text: Yeah, I was speechless too when I learned about it!
